sqlMap.insert: /* mvRoadDAO.insertMvRoad */ /* 특별관리구간 상세정보 등록 */ INSERT INTO TN_SPECL_MANAGE_SCTN_DETAIL ( SPCL_NO ,BSNS_NM ,ROUTE_CODE ,CNTRWK_SCTN ,TRACK_CO ,BSNS_QY ,TOT_WCT ,BSNS_BEGIN_YEAR ,BSNS_END_YEAR ,COMPET_DE ,BSNS_OPERTN_MAN ,STRTPT_NM ,ENDPT_NM ,MAJOR_PASAGEPAPR ,PAV_MTRQLT ,PAV_THICK_ASCON ,PAV_THICK_BASE ,PAV_THICK_ASSTNBASE ,TUNNEL_KND ,TUNNEL_CO ,TUNNEL_LEN ,BRIDGE_KND ,BRIDGE_CO ,BRIDGE_LEN ) VALUES ( #SPCL_NO#::numeric ,#BSNS_NM# ,#ROUTE_CODE# ,#CNTRWK_SCTN# ,#TRACK_CO#::numeric ,#BSNS_QY#::numeric ,#TOT_WCT#::numeric ,#BSNS_BEGIN_YEAR# ,#BSNS_END_YEAR# ,#COMPET_DE# ,#BSNS_OPERTN_MAN# ,#STRTPT_NM# ,#ENDPT_NM# ,#MAJOR_PASAGEPAPR# ,#PAV_MTRQLT# ,#PAV_THICK_ASCON#::numeric ,#PAV_THICK_BASE#::numeric ,#PAV_THICK_ASSTNBASE#::numeric ,#TUNNEL_KND# ,#TUNNEL_CO#::numeric ,#TUNNEL_LEN#::numeric ,#BRIDGE_KND# ,#BRIDGE_CO#::numeric ,#BRIDGE_LEN#::numeric )
sqlMap.select: /* mvRoadDAO.selectMvRoad */ /* 특별관리구간 상세정보 조회 */ SELECT BSNS_NM ,ROUTE_CODE ,CNTRWK_SCTN ,TRACK_CO::numeric ,BSNS_QY::numeric ,TOT_WCT::numeric ,BSNS_BEGIN_YEAR ,BSNS_END_YEAR ,COMPET_DE ,BSNS_OPERTN_MAN ,STRTPT_NM ,ENDPT_NM ,MAJOR_PASAGEPAPR ,PAV_MTRQLT ,PAV_THICK_ASCON::numeric ,PAV_THICK_BASE::numeric ,PAV_THICK_ASSTNBASE::numeric ,TUNNEL_KND ,TUNNEL_CO::numeric ,TUNNEL_LEN::numeric ,BRIDGE_KND ,BRIDGE_CO::numeric ,BRIDGE_LEN::numeric FROM TN_SPECL_MANAGE_SCTN_DETAIL WHERE spcl_no = #SPCL_NO#::numeric
sqlMap.insert: /* mvRoadDAO.updateMvRoad */ /* 특별관리구간 상세정보 수정 */ UPDATE TN_SPECL_MANAGE_SCTN_DETAIL SET BSNS_NM = #BSNS_NM# ,ROUTE_CODE = #ROUTE_CODE# ,CNTRWK_SCTN = #CNTRWK_SCTN# ,TRACK_CO = #TRACK_CO#::numeric ,BSNS_QY = #BSNS_QY#::numeric ,TOT_WCT = #TOT_WCT#::numeric ,BSNS_BEGIN_YEAR = #BSNS_BEGIN_YEAR# ,BSNS_END_YEAR = #BSNS_END_YEAR# ,COMPET_DE = #COMPET_DE# ,BSNS_OPERTN_MAN = #BSNS_OPERTN_MAN# ,STRTPT_NM = #STRTPT_NM# ,ENDPT_NM = #ENDPT_NM# ,MAJOR_PASAGEPAPR = #MAJOR_PASAGEPAPR# ,PAV_MTRQLT = #PAV_MTRQLT# ,PAV_THICK_ASCON = #PAV_THICK_ASCON#::numeric ,PAV_THICK_BASE = #PAV_THICK_BASE#::numeric ,PAV_THICK_ASSTNBASE = #PAV_THICK_ASSTNBASE#::numeric ,TUNNEL_KND = #TUNNEL_KND# ,TUNNEL_CO = #TUNNEL_CO#::numeric ,TUNNEL_LEN = #TUNNEL_LEN#::numeric ,BRIDGE_KND = #BRIDGE_KND# ,BRIDGE_CO = #BRIDGE_CO#::numeric ,BRIDGE_LEN = #BRIDGE_LEN#::numeric WHERE 1 = 1 AND spcl_no = #SPCL_NO#::numeric
